name: Bitcoin Asia
description: BTCA is an ERC20 token. BTCA is the utility token forming the backbone of Bitcoinasia's ecosystem. BTCA token will be based on Ethereum blockchain. Its total supply is 1 Billion. It's a decentralized peer to peer cryptocurrency for Travel And Tourism Industry. The token holders will be rewarded with various benefits on travel and tourism products. BTCA can be used to book an entire vacation with cryptocurrency for Asia Continent.
